altTitles.vi: Đội thám tử học viện Clamp

description.en: CLAMP School Detectives focuses on the exploits of Akira, Nokoru, and Suoh - 3 pre-teen sleuths - and their quest to make the CLAMP world safe for the girls in their class…
description.pt-br: Bem vindos à Escola CLAMP! O instituto de mais prestígio do Japão. Um lugar também muito conhecido por seus alunos serem mais inteligentes que os professores. Os melhores estudantes e líderes do Grêmio Estudantil da Escola de Ensino Fundamental, Nokoru Imonoyama, Suoh Takamura e Akira Ijuin, encontram uma forma de desafiar seu intelecto formando a Equipe de Detetives da Escola Clamp, cuja misão é ajudar a todas as mulheres com problemas.

biography.en:
CLAMP is a four-woman manga studio formed from the remaining members of the CLAMP doujinshi circle.

- [Ohkawa Ageha](https://mangadex.org/author/937ca459-3e37-450f-9114-ef81a37e335f/ohkawa-ageha) (leader; story & script)
- [Apapa Mokona](https://mangadex.org/author/259db6b3-3c79-4bbc-82f4-b65dde73e904/apapa-mokona) (lead artist; colorist)
- [Nekoi Tsubaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3dffe29e-f96d-446b-a288-84120d4f1297/nekoi-tsubaki) (art assistant; chibi artist)
- Igarashi Satsuki (design; art assistant)

Former Members:
O-Kyon
Nanao Sei
[Akiyama Tamayo](https://mangadex.org/author/e945c2df-7420-42e3-a106-e05b8475aeee/akiyama-tamayo)
[Sei Leeza](https://mangadex.org/author/9dd0940d-4a6d-4f6e-80bf-6884c0b8a64c/sei-leeza)
Hishika Soushi
Nakamori Kazue
Oumi Shinya

CLAMP is a four-woman manga studio formed from the remaining members of the CLAMP doujinshi circle.

- [Ohkawa Ageha](https://mangadex.org/author/937ca459-3e37-450f-9114-ef81a37e335f/ohkawa-ageha) (leader; story & script)
- [Apapa Mokona](https://mangadex.org/author/259db6b3-3c79-4bbc-82f4-b65dde73e904/apapa-mokona) (lead artist; colorist)
- [Nekoi Tsubaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3dffe29e-f96d-446b-a288-84120d4f1297/nekoi-tsubaki) (art assistant; chibi artist)
